introduction: Package Pals is a circular packaging initiative that seeks to extend the life cycle of packaging. We collect used e-commerce packaging from members of the public, distributing it back to businesses seeking eco-friendly, second hand packaging options. Started in May 2020, Package Pals has worked with multiple large and small businesses, schools, NGOs and governmental organisations.

business_model.concept: Circular packaging initiative extending packaging lifecycle
business_model.process: Collect used e-commerce packaging from public, distribute to businesses

top_3_advice: The first step to taking action is a willingness to act on gaps or issues identified. Also, never disregard the value of collaboration! - Rachel Han
The best environmental solutions start with using what you already have. Make use of the resources on hand to reduce your environmental impact. - Rachel Lee
Social media is such a powerful tool. Use your platforms to gain a wider outreach and to spread the ideas that you believe in. - Puan Xin
how_can_help: Help set up drop-off points in offices, schools, or businesses
Establish take-back systems for branded packaging
Share experiences on eco-friendly packaging topics
founding_story: Started after co-founders observed packaging waste from online shopping rise during COVID-19, while 2nd-hand sellers faced shortage of mailers. Began with a Telegram group message about recycling poly mailers.
main_challenges: Receptiveness of second-hand packaging concept from consumers and businesses
Oversupply of certain packaging types (bubble wrap, plastic wrappers) vs lack of others
Unwanted donations including non-accepted items and inappropriate donations

education_approach.business_engagement: Demonstrate demand and customer receptiveness for sustainable packaging
education_approach.advocacy: Companies reuse packaging from customers via drop-off points or mail-back systems

future_plans: Shift customer perception of second-hand packaging
Expand to more schools, businesses and malls
Drive impact in mass consumer market
Work with retailers on operational level

impact_achievements.community_level: Instagram followers and packaging donation/distribution numbers

age_note: Started by 19-year-olds, now scaling to corporate impact
